IllFormatedConfig: Config file seems ill-formated, using default. Please use Generic Mod Config Menu to configure.
api-too-old: Please update {{apiName}}({{APIID}}) to at least version {{minversion}}. Current version {{currentversion}}. Integration disabled.
CanAxeAllBushes.title: Can Axe All Bushes
CanAxeAllBushes.description: Enable to allow axing of all bushes.
GreenhouseBushesAlwaysBloom.title: Greenhouse Bushes Always Bloom
GreenhouseBushesAlwaysBloom.description: If enabled, medium bushes placed in the greenhouse will always bloom.
ShopLocation.title: Shop Location
ShopLocation.description: The location of the bush shop in Caroline's sunroom.
ShowBushShopGraphic.title: Show Bush Shop Graphic
ShowBushShopGraphic.description: Shows a little pair of bushes where the bush shop is.
ShouldNPCsTrampleBushes.title: Should NPCs Trample Bushes.
ShouldNPCsTrampleBushes.description: If enabled, will allow NPCs to remove bushes in their path.
RelaxedPlacement.title: Relaxed Placement
RelaxedPlacement.description: If enabled, placement rules will be relaxed.
AllowBushStacking.title: Bush Stacking
AllowBushStacking.description: If enabled, bushes will be able to stack.
PreserveModData.title: Preserve Mod Data
PreserveModData.description: If enabled, mod data will be preserved for bushes, but stacking may be less efficient.
ShopCostScale.title: Shop Cost Scale
ShopCostScale.description: Scales the cost of bushes in the shop.
BushesInFurnitureCatalogue.title: Bushes in Catalogue
BushesInFurnitureCatalogue.description: If set, bushes will show up in the furniture catalogue.
caroline.mail: Hi @!^^Recently I've gotten into growing some bushes, and I think I might have a few extra to sell. Feel free to come around by my sunroom if you want some!^^ -- Caroline[#]Caroline's Bush Store
bush.small.description: Place to grow a small bush.
bush.medium.description: Place to grow a medium bush.
bush.large.description: Place to grow a large bush.
bush.small.alt.description: Place to grow an alternative small bush.
bush.town.description: Place to grow a town bush.
bush.town.big.description: Place to grow a large town bush
bush.walnut.description: Place to grow a decorative walnut bush
bush.harvested.description: Place to grow a decorative, already harvested walnut bush.
